params.name: note
params.description: The card's note content. Only valid for cards without another type of content, so this must be omitted if `content_id` and `content_type` are specified.

params.name: content_id
params.description: The id of the issue to associate with this card.

params.name: content_type
params.description: **Required if you specify a content_id**. The type of content to associate with this card. Can only be "Issue" at this time.

params.name: note
params.description: The card's note content. Only valid for cards without another type of content, so this cannot be specified if the card already has a `content_id` and `content_type`.

params.name: position
params.description: Can be one of `top`, `bottom`, or `after:<card_id>`, where `<card_id>` is the `id` value of a card in the same column, or in the new column specified by `column_id`.

params.name: column_id
params.description: The `id` value of a column in the same project.
